sait.mls.persistence.clientale

Class ClientBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.mls.persistence.clientale.ClientBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Broker

    public class ClientBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Broker, java.io.Serializable
    Class Description: An implementation of the abstract Broker interface that controls how the client RandomAccessFile database is accessed by the GUI ClientWindow.
    Version:
    February 4, 2019
    Author:
    dwatson, Nick Hamnett
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static ClientBroker clientBroker
      A static reference to the clientBroker object to allow checking for its existence prior to allocating a new reference.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Client> clientList 
      private long highId
      An attribute to hold the current value of the last assigned id number to client records in the random access file.
      private static java.lang.String INPUT_FILE
      A constant representing the relative file path to the initial client text file data.
      private static java.lang.String RANDOM_FILE
      A constant representing the relative file path to the client random access file.
      private static long serialVersionUID

      Constructor is called only when the getBroker method is called.

      Method controls generation of a CustomerBroker reference by checking to see if the object already exists in memory.

      Method to add a new or modified record to the clients binary file.

      Method loads the current binary file being used as the ongoing database file.

      Method to logically delete a record from the client binary file.
      java.util.List search(java.lang.Object o)
      Method to search the Client RandomAccessFile back end allowing a search to be carried out based on the following criteria: membership id, first name, last name, postal code, phone number, or client type.

      Method to search for the first name of a client and return all matching results as a list to the calling method.

      Method to search for the client id number and return all matching results as a list to the calling method.

      Method to search for the phone number of a client and return all matching results as a list to the calling method.
      private java.util.List searchPostalCode(java.util.ArrayList al, java.lang.String pc)
      Method to search for the postal code of a client and return all matching results as a list to the calling method.
      private java.util.List searchType(java.util.ArrayList al, char type)
      Method to search for the type of client and return all matching results as a list to the calling method where client type is 'R' for residential and 'C' for commercial.

    • Method Detail

      • getBroker

        public static ClientBroker getBroker()
        Method controls generation of a CustomerBroker reference by checking to see if the object already exists in memory. Part of the Singleton Design Pattern.
        Returns:
        Instance of ClientBroker

      • search

        public java.util.List search(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to search the Client RandomAccessFile back end allowing a search to be carried out based on the following criteria: membership id, first name, last name, postal code, phone number, or client type.
        Specified by:
        search in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        o - an Object of type Client containing the search value of the item to search for that maybe a search for: client id, first name, last name, postal code, phone number, or client type.
        Returns:
        a List of Client objects matching the search criteria that are passed on to the GUI front end. The list is originally created by the back end as an ArrayList and returned as a List.

      • persist

        public boolean persist(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to add a new or modified record to the clients binary file.
        Specified by:
        persist in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        o - a Object of type Client containing all information about a customer to be written to the clients binary file called clients.bin.
        Returns:
        a boolean confirming that the client record has been successfully added or modified.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to logically delete a record from the client binary file.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        o - a Object of type Client containing all information about a customer to be deleted from the client binary file called clients.bin.
        Returns:
        a boolean confirming that the client record has been successfully deleted.

      • closeBroker

        public void closeBroker()
        Method to release resources allocated to the broker and save all modified data. NOTE if this method is not called data may be lost.
        Specified by:
        closeBroker in interface Broker

      • loadClientBinaryFile

        private void loadClientBinaryFile()
                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Creates a RandomAccessFile as a data structure to store client information in a binary format. This method is used only to create a database file if no binary file for the clients currently exists.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • readBinaryFile

        private void readBinaryFile()
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Method loads the current binary file being used as the ongoing database file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if binary file could not be found.

      • findHighestCurrentId

        private void findHighestCurrentId()
        Method to search for the last highest id assigned and save it in the class level attribute highId.

      • findClientId

        private int findClientId(long id)
        A method to determine the byte offset of a client record stored in the random access file.
        Parameters:
        id - - the id of the client record being located.
        Returns:
        the byte offset from the beginning of the client file.

      • searchLastName

        private java.util.List searchLastName(java.util.ArrayList al,
                                      java.lang.String name)
        Method to search for the last name of a client and return all matching results as a list to the calling method.
        Parameters:
        al - - ArrayList to contain all clients found.
        name - - search parameter of last name
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all clients found.

        Parameters:
        al - - ArrayList to contain all clients found.
        name - - search parameter of first name
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all clients found.

        private java.util.List searchType(java.util.ArrayList al,
                                  char type)
        Method to search for the type of client and return all matching results as a list to the calling method where client type is 'R' for residential and 'C' for commercial.
